description:
Hike it out to bear country (or anywhere, really) in these Women's Hike Light Cushion Bear Country Print Crew Socks, featuring an original design by Brittany Lewis for Smartwool. Made with Smartwool’s top sock innovations and a women’s-specific, stay-put fit, plus updated mesh zones and increased durability to take on even the toughest of trails. Light cushioning along the entire bottom of the foot keeps your feet feeling jazzy. Enjoy every mile in total comfort—and if you are hiking out in bear country, always be bear aware. ;)

  • Brittney Lewis designs by Smartwool®
  • Indestructawool™ technology with extended durability zones
  • 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit
  • Additional body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort
  • Comfort welt with 'stay put' fit
  • Women's specific fit
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Bear Country Print Crew Socks - Women's
